errors.message: Manifest added an explicit persistence.identity_policy to satisfy local_persistence_rules.identity_policy_required. This is a significant change compared to upstream relationship.json and should be reviewed by stakeholders.
Module namespace normalization recorded for core.printing.ConsolePrinter (module 'core.printing' matches file 'core/printing.py'). This is informational and expected given normalization rules.

LibraryApp.run was modeled to accept explicit path parameters (books_path, members_path, loans_path) to comply with path_ownership_rules. Composition root (Main) must supply concrete paths at runtime.

summary: Manifest is syntactically valid and consistent with manifest rules; contains one noteworthy persistence-policy change requiring stakeholder review.
